title: A doleful discourse and ruthfull reporte of the greate spoyle and lamentable losse, by fire, in the towne of East Dearham, in the countie of Norfolke vpon Tuesday the. 18. of Iulie, this present yere .1581.
author: Gurney, Arthur.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Richard Bradocke, for Richarde Hollens: and are to be solde at his shop oueragainst the signe of the Bell within Algate,
